patterns: What is the MSA document at Hanmak Technologies?
How does the Master Subscription Agreement (MSA) work?
Tell me about the terms and conditions in the MSA.
responses: Our team shares the Master Subscription Agreement (MSA) with terms and conditions. Once signed, you share it back with us, indicating your agreement to the service terms.

patterns: How is the order confirmed at Hanmak Technologies?
What happens after signing the MSA?
Tell me about confirming the order.
responses: Your team confirms the order by sending a Local Purchase Order (LPO) with the initial advance payment. Issuance of the LPO and payment indicates your commitment to proceed with implementation.
